text: El-ghe (Ꙥ ꙥ) is a letter of the Cyrillic script. Ꙥ is romanized as L̃, Lj, or even Ł. In certain Old Slavonic manuscripts, a character of the same shape could be used to represent palatalized /lʲ/, a role similar to the Serbian/Macedonian letter lje (Љ љ). Category:Cyrillic letters
title: El-ghe
